name: Knight of the Chalice
text: Devils scheme amid the layers of the Nine Hells and infest the world with evil. You are sworn to protect innocents from their infernal machinations. To this end, you have joined an order of like-minded warriors.

features.censureDevils(11thLevel): You gain the Channel Divinity power censure devils
features.savingAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you also make a saving throw against each effect on you that a save can end
features.auraSuppression(16thLevel): When you hit any creature marked by you that has an aura, the aura is deactivated

flavorText: Begone, devils! You have no power here!
